Recent python work:
```{python}
my_seq1 = "ATCATCATG"
my_seq2 = "CAGCCCAATCAGGCTCTACTGCCACTAAACTTACGCAGGATATATTTACGCCGACGTACT"

def mers(sequence):
        hold = {}
        
        for i in range(len(sequence) - 1):
            if sequence[i:i + 3] in hold:
                hold[sequence[i:i +3]] +=1
            else:
                hold[sequence[i:i + 3]] = 1
        return hold
print(mers(my_seq1))
print(mers(my_seq2))
```
